body_html:
0) Have I written custom code:
Yes. For test on my single GeForce GTX 1070 machine I changed one code line:
BEFORE:

distribution = tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy(["/device:GPU:0", "/device:GPU:1"])

AFTER:

distribution = tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy(["/device:GPU:0"])

1) OS Platform and Distribution:
-Linux UbuntuPC 4.4.0-130-generic #156-Ubuntu SMP Thu Jun 14 08:53:28 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
2) TensorFlow installed from:
sudo pip3.5 install ***
3) TensorFlow version:
Checked on two versions of tf:
a) 1.10.nightly
tf_nightly_gpu-1.10.0.dev20180620-cp35-cp35m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
b) 1.9.rc2
tensorflow_gpu-1.9.0rc2-cp35-cp35m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
4) Bazel version:

Extracting Bazel installation...
Build label: 0.13.1
Build target: bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
Build time: Wed May 23 11:17:23 2018 (1527074243)
Build timestamp: 1527074243
Build timestamp as int: 1527074243

5) CUDA/cuDNN version
CUDA - 9.0.176.2
cuDNN - 7.1.2
6) GPU model and memory:
Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 8Gb
7) Exact command to reproduce:

$ python3.5 simple_estimator_example.py

body:
**0) Have I written custom code:**
Yes. For test on my single GeForce GTX 1070 machine I changed one code line:
BEFORE:

> distribution = tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy(["/device:GPU:0", "/device:GPU:1"])

AFTER:

> distribution = tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy(["/device:GPU:0"])

**1) OS Platform and Distribution:**
-Linux UbuntuPC 4.4.0-130-generic #156-Ubuntu SMP Thu Jun 14 08:53:28 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
**2) TensorFlow installed from:**
sudo pip3.5 install ***
**3) TensorFlow version:**
Checked on two versions of tf:
     a) 1.10.nightly
     tf_nightly_gpu-1.10.0.dev20180620-cp35-cp35m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
     b) 1.9.rc2
     tensorflow_gpu-1.9.0rc2-cp35-cp35m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
**4) Bazel version:**
> Extracting Bazel installation...
> Build label: 0.13.1
> Build target: bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
> Build time: Wed May 23 11:17:23 2018 (1527074243)
> Build timestamp: 1527074243
> Build timestamp as int: 1527074243

**5) CUDA/cuDNN version**
CUDA - 9.0.176.2
cuDNN - 7.1.2
**6) GPU model and memory:**
Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 8Gb
**7) Exact command to reproduce:**

> $ python3.5 simple_estimator_example.py
